author: Deborah J. Nelson
title: Blood-pressure drugs are in the crosshairs of COVID-19 research
description: Scientists are baffled by how the coronavirus attacks the body - killing many patients while barely affecting others.
content:
(Reuters) - Scientists are baffled by how the coronavirus attacks the body - killing many patients while barely affecting others.
